text:
Created attachment 35523
httpd conf file

I configured apache http web server to redirect incoming WEBSERVICE call to
another backend application server, X-Forwarded-For is missing(webserver
ip) in backend call.

I have configured below in my webserver httpd.conf file.

ProxyPass /TestProject http://10.160.160.33:2914/TestProject
ProxyPassReverse /TestProject http://10.160.160.33:2914/TestProject


Please note X-Forwarded-Host is working fine, only X-Forwarded-For is missing. I already posted in "User Support and Discussion", this is not resolved.http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/httpd-users/201711.mbox/browser

Attached my httpd.conf file further, I am using apachelounge httpd build https://www.apachelounge.com/

Please review and suggest
creator: surendhar.t1241@gmail.com
